main event: Observers at Fort Bliss, Texas, sighted a stationary flat silver object with a very bright sun reflection.
interesting points: The object was described as flat and shining like a silver dollar., The sighting lasted for 3 minutes., The observers used a 3 Power Telescope to view the object., It was noted that the object was stationary and did not move., The report classified the object as a balloon.
witness description: Military personnel from the 82nd AAA AW Bn and the 5th AAA AW Bn.
